#text=Flying in an airplane for the first time can be a wonderful experience .
#text=Once you are all settled into your seat you will hear all the safety messages .
#text=These tend to be pretty boring but every now and then an airline will give the safety messages some new twist or humor .
#text=During the safety briefing , the plane will be heading towards the runaway for takeoff .
#text=Once the plane is ready for takeoff , all the flight attendants will sit and buckle themselves in .
#text=Next comes the best part - the plane will accelerate very quickly from sitting to flying in the air .
#text=The process barely takes a minute but you 'll feel the rush from going so fast .
#text=You 'll continue feeling the effects until the plane gets high enough into the air to reach a cruising altitude .
#text=Once this height is reached , you will barely notice you 're in the air unless you look outside the window .
